# eth_sendUserOperation

This method returns submits the user operation to be included on-chain, and returns the `userOpHash` if successful (or queued). If the operation is not successful, it will return an error.

## EntryPoint v0.7

### Request

:::warning[Warning]

The EntryPoint v0.7 API expects an `UnPackedUserOperation` instead of a `PackedUserOperation`.
According to spec it is bundler's responsibility to pack the userOp before sending it to the EntryPoint.
So make sure to send an `UnPackedUserOperation` to the bundler.

:::

:::warning[Warning]

For entryPoint v0.7, we will not be reverting if the `callData` field in the user operation fails.
We revert only when you are calling `eth_estimateUserOperationGas`.

:::

```json
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "method": "eth_sendUserOperation",
    "params": [
        {
            "sender": "0xa203fDb8bC335F86016F635b85389B62B189E417",
            "nonce": "0x35bf2a054f92f3730b87582ef223c8d663f9eb01158154750000000000000000",
            "factory": "0x",
            "factoryData": "0x",
            "callData": "",
            "callGasLimit": "0x115b5c0",
            "verificationGasLimit": "0x249f0",
            "preVerificationGas": "0xeb11",
            "maxPriorityFeePerGas": "0x12a05f200",
            "maxFeePerGas": "0x5b08082fa",
            "paymaster": "0x",
            "paymasterVerificationGasLimit": "0x",
            "paymasterPostOpGasLimit": "0x",
            "paymasterData": "0x",
            "signature": "0xa6cc6589c8bd561cfd68d7b6b0757ef6f208e7438782939938498eee7d703260137856c840c491b3d415956265e81bf5c2184a725be2abfc365f7536b6af525e1c"
        },
        "0x0000000071727De22E5E9d8BAf0edAc6f37da032"
    ],
    "id": 1
}
```

### Response

```json
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 1,
    "result": "0x4c31ae84205a9c862dd8d0822f427fb516448451850ee6f65351951f6a2b2154"
}
```

## EntryPoint v0.6

### Request

```json
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "method": "eth_sendUserOperation",
    "params": [
        {
            "sender":"0xa203fDb8bC335F86016F635b85389B62B189E417",
            "nonce":"0x35bf2a054f92f3730b87582ef223c8d663f9eb01158154750000000000000000",
            "initCode":"0x",
            "callData":"",
            "callGasLimit":"0x115b5c0",
            "verificationGasLimit":"0x249f0",
            "preVerificationGas":"0xeb11",
            "maxPriorityFeePerGas":"0x12a05f200",
            "maxFeePerGas":"0x5b08082fa",
            "paymasterAndData":"0x",
            "signature":"0xa6cc6589c8bd561cfd68d7b6b0757ef6f208e7438782939938498eee7d703260137856c840c491b3d415956265e81bf5c2184a725be2abfc365f7536b6af525e1c"
        },
        "0x5FF137D4b0FDCD49DcA30c7CF57E578a026d2789"
    ],
    "id": 1
}
```

### Response

```json
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "id": 1,
    "result": "0x4c31ae84205a9c862dd8d0822f427fb516448451850ee6f65351951f6a2b2154"
}
```
